attributes.action: ban the wearing of veils in public places
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I propose a ban on all veils that cover most of peoples faces, and sometimes eyes. I have also heard that it is not in 'their' faith to wear these veils. Anyone found doing so, will be given a £25, on-the-spot penalty, anyone who refuses to do this, will have their veil removed, and "pounded", so they will have to pay a £100 penalty to retreive it.

rejection.details:
There is a very similar petition here:
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Identity-Hiding/
If you still wish to resubmit, you may do so.
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
